element.name: Adventurers League: Tyranny of Dragons
element.description: The D&D Adventurers League is an ongoing official campaign for Dungeons & Dragons. It uses the fifth edition Dungeons & Dragons rules, and features the Forgotten Realms setting. You can play D&D Adventurers League games literally anywhere. Players use the fifth edition rules to create a character and bring that character to games anywhere D&D Adventurers League play is happening.

select.name: Optional Trait, Plane-Touched Wings
select.supports: Optional Aasimar Trait Plane Touched Wings

element.name: Plane-Touched Wings
element.supports: Optional Aasimar Trait Plane Touched Wings

description.html: You can permanently replace the Light Bearer trait and racial trait you gain at 3rd level to sprout feathered wings—gaining a fly speed of 30 ft while not wearing heavy armor.

sheet.description: You sprout feathered wings—gaining a fly speed of 30 ft while not wearing heavy armor.
